member.name: T:Falsus.Shared.Helpers.ResourceReader
member.summary: Helper class to assist in reading DLL embedded resources.

member.name: M:Falsus.Shared.Helpers.ResourceReader.ReadContentsFromFile``1(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the contents from the specified resouce file as JSON and deserializes as an instance of the specified type parameter.
member.typeparam: The type to deserilize the JSON.
member.param: The path for the embedded resource.
member.returns: The contents of the specified resource file as an instnace of the specified type parameter.
